@@ -1,1 +177,181 @@def test_explode_sets():
    # https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/35614
    df = pd.DataFrame({"a": [{"x", "y"}], "b": [1]}, index=[1])
    result = df.explode(column="a").sort_values(by="a")
    expected = pd.DataFrame({"a": ["x", "y"], "b": [1, 1]}, index=[1, 1])
